questions.question: Considering the overall visual appearance, what is the primary color of the product packaging?

Examining the packaging, does it display any notable graphic designs or illustrations?

Is the text on the packaging printed or handwritten?

Observing the packaging's structure, is it a single layer or multilayered?
From a visual perspective, does the packaging appear to be sealed or open?
